title: Readout of President Donald J. Trump’s Meeting with President Alain Berset of Switzerland – The White House
content:
Statements & Releases			

		Foreign Policy	

Issued on:
January 26, 2018
President Donald J. Trump met today with President Alain Berset of the Swiss Confederation.  The President thanked his counterpart for the gracious welcome in Davos.  Both leaders underscored United States-Switzerland partnerships in investment, innovation, and transparent global economic governance, and discussed ongoing efforts to denuclearize the Korean peninsula and address unfair Chinese trade practices.
